main.name: Krittiya Pichai
main.bio: I am newly graduated in Information Technology from Sirindhorn International Institute of Technology (SIIT), Thammasat University.I am interested in full stack developer because developing website both front-end and back-end is my passion and I’d like to challenge myself to create website with complex code make it into a beautiful, and responsive user interface. I will be very proud when I have designed and developed a website that the users will have the best possible user’s experience.

projects.title: Krittiya's Resume
projects.category: Resume website made by myself that represent my personal information and portfolio. Developed by React and deployed by Firebase.

projects.title: iJune Shop
projects.category: This project is part of ITS344 Web and Business Application Development, first time that I know about React. This website simulate Online Mobile Shop for customers. It's developed by React and Bootstrap.

projects.title: Online Book Shop
projects.category: This is my first project in university that I have developed by myself, part of ITS322 Database System. It's has features for customers and staffs. This website develop by CSS, HTML, PHP, and MySQL

projects.title: JOTZombie
projects.category: This project is part of ITS353 Graphic and Game Programming, first time that I designed and made game project. This project is third-person shooting game (TPS) and survival from zombies. It's developed by Unity software.

projects.title: Game Development
projects.category: This is my 4th year senior project. This project is action role-playing game (RPG) with apocalypse world theme. It's developed by Unity software.
